verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein his <S%H1>father<s%> was a <S%H4033>stranger<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>. wherein: Heb. of his father's sojournings

These are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>. <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, being <S%H6240>seventeen<s%> <S%H7651><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, was <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> with his <S%H251>brethren<s%>; and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> was with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%>, and with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%>, his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>: and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%> their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1681>report<s%>.

Now <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> more than all his <S%H1121>children<s%>, because he was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of his old <S%H2208>age<s%>: and he <S%H6213>made<s%> him a <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colours<s%>. colours: or, pieces

And when his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> him more than all his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him, and <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> unto him.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and he <S%H5046>told<s%> it his <S%H251>brethren<s%>: and they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him yet the <S%H3254>more<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H8085>Hear<s%>, I pray you, this <S%H2472>dream<s%> which I have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%>:

For, behold, we were <S%H481>binding<s%> <S%H8432><s%> <S%H485>sheaves<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and, lo, my <S%H485>sheaf<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and also stood <S%H5324>upright<s%>; and, behold, your <S%H485>sheaves<s%> stood round <S%H5437>about<s%>, and made <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> to my <S%H485>sheaf<s%>.

And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Shalt thou <S%H4427>indeed<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%> over us? or shalt thou <S%H4910>indeed<s%> have <S%H4910>dominion<s%> over us? And they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him yet the <S%H3254>more<s%> for his <S%H2472>dreams<s%>, and for his <S%H1697>words<s%>.

And he <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> yet <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and <S%H5608>told<s%> it his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, I have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> more; and, behold, the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and the <S%H6240>eleven<s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H3556>stars<s%> made <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> to me.

And he <S%H5608>told<s%> it to his <S%H1>father<s%>, and to his <S%H251>brethren<s%>: and his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, What is this <S%H2472>dream<s%> that thou hast <S%H2492>dreamed<s%>? Shall I and thy <S%H517>mother<s%> and thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>indeed<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to bow <S%H7812>down<s%> ourselves to thee to the <S%H776>earth<s%>?
And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> him; but his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8104>observed<s%> the <S%H1697>saying<s%>.
And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6629>flock<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, Do not thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> the flock in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>? <S%H3212>come<s%>, and I will send <S%H7971>thee<s%> unto them. And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Here am I.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, I pray thee, <S%H7200>see<s%> whether it be <S%H7965>well<s%> with thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H7965>well<s%> with the <S%H6629>flocks<s%>; and <S%H7725>bring<s%> me <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>. So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> him out of the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>. see: Heb. see the peace of thy brethren, etc.

And a certain <S%H376>man<s%> found <S%H4672>him<s%>, and, behold, he was <S%H8582>wandering<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>: and the <S%H376>man<s%> asked <S%H7592>him<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What <S%H1245>seekest<s%> thou?
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H251>brethren<s%>: <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, I pray thee, <S%H375>where<s%> they <S%H7462>feed<s%> their flocks.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, They are <S%H5265>departed<s%> <S%H2088>hence<s%>; for I <S%H8085>heard<s%> them <S%H559>say<s%>, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H1886>Dothan<s%>. And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> them in <S%H1886>Dothan<s%>.
And when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> him afar <S%H7350>off<s%>, even before he came <S%H7126>near<s%> unto them, they <S%H5230>conspired<s%> against him to <S%H4191>slay<s%> him.
And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>, Behold, <S%H1976>this<s%> <S%H1167>dreamer<s%> <S%H2472><s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>. dreamer: Heb. master of dreams

<S%H3212>Come<s%> now therefore, and let us <S%H2026>slay<s%> him, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into <S%H259>some<s%> <S%H953>pit<s%>, and we will <S%H559>say<s%>, Some <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> him: and we shall <S%H7200>see<s%> what will become of his <S%H2472>dreams<s%>.
And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, and he <S%H5337>delivered<s%> him out of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us not <S%H5221>kill<s%> <S%H5315><s%> him.

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H8210>Shed<s%> no <S%H1818>blood<s%>, but <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into this <S%H953>pit<s%> that is in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H7971>lay<s%> no <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon him; that he might <S%H5337>rid<s%> him out of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, to <S%H7725>deliver<s%> him to his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, that they <S%H6584>stript<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> out <S%H854>of<s%> his <S%H3801>coat<s%>, his <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colours<s%> that was on him; colours: or, pieces
And they <S%H3947>took<s%> him, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into a <S%H953>pit<s%>: and the <S%H953>pit<s%> was <S%H7386>empty<s%>, there was no <S%H4325>water<s%> in it.

And they sat <S%H3427>down<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>: and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and, behold, a <S%H736>company<s%> of <S%H3459>Ishmeelites<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> with their <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H5219>spicery<s%> and <S%H6875>balm<s%> and <S%H3910>myrrh<s%>, <S%H1980>going<s%> to carry it <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, What <S%H1215>profit<s%> is it if we <S%H2026>slay<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%>, and <S%H3680>conceal<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%>?

<S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us <S%H4376>sell<s%> him to the <S%H3459>Ishmeelites<s%>, and let not our <S%H3027>hand<s%> be upon him; for he is our <S%H251>brother<s%> and our <S%H1320>flesh<s%>. And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> were <S%H8085>content<s%>. were: Heb. hearkened

Then there <S%H5674>passed<s%> by <S%H4084>Midianites<s%> <S%H582>merchantmen<s%> <S%H5503><s%>; and they <S%H4900>drew<s%> and lifted <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> out of the <S%H953>pit<s%>, and <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> to the <S%H3459>Ishmeelites<s%> for <S%H6242>twenty<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>: and they <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto the <S%H953>pit<s%>; and, behold, <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was not in the <S%H953>pit<s%>; and he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>.
And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3206>child<s%> is not; and I, <S%H575>whither<s%> shall I <S%H935>go<s%>?

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H3801>coat<s%>, and <S%H7819>killed<s%> a <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%>, and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%>;

And they <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colours<s%>, and they <S%H935>brought<s%> it to their <S%H1>father<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%>, This have we <S%H4672>found<s%>: <S%H5234>know<s%> now whether it be thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H3801>coat<s%> or no.

And he knew <S%H5234>it<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, It is my <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H3801>coat<s%>; an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> him; <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> is without <S%H2963>doubt<s%> rent in <S%H2963>pieces<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H8071>clothes<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> upon his <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and <S%H56>mourned<s%> for his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And all his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and all his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> him; but he <S%H3985>refused<s%> to be <S%H5162>comforted<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, For I will go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H7585>grave<s%> unto my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H57>mourning<s%>. Thus his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> for him.

And the <S%H4092>Midianites<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> him into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto <S%H6318>Potiphar<s%>, an <S%H5631>officer<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%>, and <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%>. officer: Heb. eunuch: but the word doth signify not only eunuchs, but also chamberlains, courtiers, and officers captain: or, chief marshal: Heb. chief of the slaughter men, or executioners
